snippet: Kyle Okposo scored two goals to tie it, and John Tavares gave them the lead with 1:24 to go in the game.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders rally to beat Dallas Stars, 4-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo scored two goals to tie it, and John Tavares gave them the lead with 1:24 to go in the game.

headline.main: Islanders’ Late Rally Adds to Stars’ Misery
headline.print_headline: Islanders’ Late Rally Adds to Stars’ Misery
